sub_title: Business Unit Manager at Oliver IT
summary:
IT all-rounder experienced in (ERP, SAP, Web) project delivery, enterprise architecture and process consulting, requirements analysis, application design, testing and support (ITIL).

Quick learner, pragmatic, goal-oriented and realizing that software solutions always need to serve business goals.

I strongly believe in the focus on delivering results while approaching everyone in a direct, fair and kind manner. I bring people together, and connect their knowledge.

projects.title: Process, Application and IT Landscape analysis at RAVO Fayat
projects.description: In the near future RAVO will start a project to move from SAP ECC to SAP S/4 HANA. They will do this in the context of the Fayat Group of which they are a part. RAVO has asked us to draw up a new application architecture and roadmap that will help to move to S/4. Not only for RAVO but also the sister companies that will be involved. Together with Thijs we held workshops with all the departments to gain insight in the structure of the organisation, the processes, applications and data and points of improvement. Based upon this insight we made a plan containing a new IT landscape architecture and roadmap to improve step by step.B&G aims to improve their IT landscape and create a better fit for their applications to support their business processes. We held workshops with all the departments to gain insight in the structure of the organisation, the processes, applications and data and points of improvement. Based upon this insight we made a plan containing a new IT landscape architecture and roadmap to improve step by step.

projects.title: Process, Application and IT Landscape analysis at BMO
projects.description:
Like many organisations BMO faces challenges to shape its future IT landscape. Changes in the market as well as in society as a whole seem to go faster all the time. Technological developments that impact businesses are being introduced rapidly, forcing companies to (re)evaluate their IT strategy and planning.

Together with Frank Koppen, Thijs van de Westelaken and Pieter Grevenstuk we held workshops with many departments to gain insight in the structure of the organisation, the processes, applications and data and points of improvement. Based upon this insight we made a plan containing a new IT landscape architecture and roadmap to improve step by step.

projects.title: Implementation service module in dealer portal and mobile app for technicians
projects.description:
Furniture Factory 'De Toekomst' is an acclaimed manufacturer of reclining chairs, armchairs and sofas.
As a next step to an earlier project where we have implemented a dealer portal integrated with SAP ECC a service module is added to this portal. Also a mobile application has been implemented that technicians use to handle work orders and communicatie with the service department. My role as a solution architect was to design the solution and keep an overview of the implementation.

projects.title: Analysis Logistic Planning and impact on warehouse processes at NEDistriService
projects.description: NEDistriService wants to optimize it's logistic planning process. The planning of delivery routes decides what deliveries are loaded in which trucks and has a big impact on the warehouse processes. The analysis was done to see how both the logistic planning and warehouse processes can be optimized by replacing the current planning software and create a different integration with the logistic backend systems.

projects.title: Enterprise Architect Stedin
projects.description: Stedin is hiring me to support with developing an Enterprise Architecture framework parallel with implementing it in the business. The Architecture framework includes functions, processes, data, IT capabilities and organisation.

projects.title: Process, Application and IT Landscape analysis at Schellevis
projects.description:
For over seventy years, Schellevis has been producing concrete products for a wide variety of applications.

I did an analysis of logistic processes, applications used in the processes and IT landscape to create a proposal. The proposal included a roadmap of IT projects within a newly drafted IT architecture, a visualisation of the impact on the as is processes, a business case and detailed offer for the 1st item on the roadmap.

projects.title: Swiss Sense Galileo - Implement Logistic Planning
projects.description: Swiss Sense is a family run mattress production company in Uden in The Netherlands. It has been founded in 1918 and delivers mattresses all across Europe. The Galileo project is to implement software that supports the logistic planning of the delivery of the mattresses. Based upon sales orders in SAP ECC, customer service employees will use the new application to plan delivery appointments with end customers. Furthermore the planners will use the new application to optimise the planning of the vehicles. My role in this project is to design the new application as well as filling in the role of project manager.

projects.title: CRH Mobile Order Fulfilment App
projects.description: For Struyk Verwo, part of the CRH group, we develop an order fulfilment application. Struyk delivers materials to customers (B2B) who build streets in The Netherlands and Belgium. On site they order materials needed based on the contract they have with Struyk. The solution is a React.js application optimized for tablets that communicates with SAP ECC, through SAP PO. Users are synchronised with Sales Force.

projects.title: Implement SAP CE/HTML5 Retailers Portal at Aldipress
projects.description:
Since 50 years Aldipress is thé knowledge centre for distribution and trade marketing of magazines, comic books, literature and puzzles for the consumer market. Aldipress is a partner for publishers and retailers and takes care of implementing efficient solutions for product lines, publish management and product presentation and promotions.
To better facilitate the Aldipress services to the retailers a new Retailers Portal is deployed in this project. It will be developed using HTML5 (backbone.js) and is deployed on SAP CE using SAP ECC backend data. My role is Project Manager.

projects.title: Material master data management; application design and implementation at Jumbo
projects.description:
Following the process analysis at Jumbo, together with a colleague we delivered a high level design of the new application that will support the maintaining of all Jumbo's (supermarket) products. The new solution will be a React.js application deployed on SAP CE and connected to SAP ECC (mostly MM).

Jumbo has taken this design as the basis of the project and has the lead in the implementation. My role during the implementation phase is a Q&A role. To give advice on scope management and specifics on the development process that demands close cooperation between SAP Functional, SAP Abap, SAP CE and Frontend Development.
